name: Legato Systems
overview: Legato Systems engages in the development, marketing, and support of storage software products and services worldwide. The companyâ€™s solutions protect and manage information, assure the availability of applications, and provide access to business-critical information in distributed open systems environments. Legato Systems, Inc. software products and services are used in information protection and recovery, hierarchal storage management, automated availability, email, and content management purposes. It sells its products and services through various channels, including direct sales, value added resellers, system integrators, distributors, and original equipment manufacturers. Legato Systems, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is based in Mountain View, California.

acquisition.source_description: EMC Completes Acquisition of LEGATO Systems
